msg: HiveMind LoggingInterceptor incompatible with proxies generated by outside means (CGLIB or Javassist)

author: afester
msg: LOGCXX-139: Switched order of XMLThreadFilter and XMLTimestampFilter to avoid the timestamp pattern matching part of the thread pattern on 64 bit platforms.

author: robbinspg
msg: Remove printing of Types to cout

author: bago
msg: Refactored direct instanceof/calls of avalon framework marker interfaces to ContainerUtil.method facility.
This is only needed to have a better overview of the places where we do "container" related things for our own objects.
Now a search for ContainerUtil in the code is really useful to understand how we use the avalon framework inside james.
